tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE healthcare_facility ( 
  facility_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
  facility_name VARCHAR(100), 
  location VARCHAR(100), 
  bed_capacity INT, 
  current_occupancy INT, 
  patient_flow_data JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE PatientFlowData (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  entry_time TIMESTAMP,
  exit_time TIMESTAMP,
  department VARCHAR(255),
  status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE BedOccupancyData (
  bed_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(255),
  occupancy_status VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ResourcesAllocation (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(255),
  resource_type VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Hospital (
    hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hospital_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    total_beds INT,
    available_beds INT
)

CREATE TABLE Patient (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(255),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    hospital_id INT,
    bed_number INT,
    admission_date DATE,
    discharge_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE BedOccupancy (
    occupancy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hospital_id INT,
    bed_number INT,
    occupancy_date DATE,
    patient_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE PatientFlow (
    flow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    hospital_id INT,
    flow_date DATE,
    incoming_patients INT,
    outgoing_patients INT,
    available_beds INT
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  admission_date DATE,
  discharge_date DATE,
  bed_assigned_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE patient_flow (
  flow_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  entry_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  exit_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  facility_id INT
);
